```{r}
gdp_trade_export<-read.csv("GdpTradeExport.csv")
#View(gdp_trade_export)
```

```{r}
#Question 1:
gdp_trade_linear<-lm(formula=GDP~Trade,data=gdp_trade_export)
lm(formula=GDP~Trade,data=gdp_trade_export)
summary(gdp_trade_linear)
summary(gdp_trade_linear)$coefficient
#Trade will increase by 94.429 (Trade) percent (GDP) for every 17755 units(Intercept) increased in GDP per capita.
```
```{r}
#Question 2
gdp_trade_industry<-lm(formula = GDP~Trade+Industry,data=gdp_trade_export)
lm(formula = GDP~Trade+Industry,data=gdp_trade_export)
summary(gdp_trade_industry)
summary(gdp_trade_industry)$coefficient
#The intercept is 1.002947e+04, the intercept of trade is 1.434189e+02, and the intercept of Industry is 1.462029e-08. 
```
